original_text: and he had provided him with a large room formerly used to store the grain offerings and incense and temple articles, and also the tithes of grain, new wine and olive oil prescribed for the Levites, musicians and gatekeepers, as well as the contributions for the priests.
korean_text: 도비야를 위하여 한 큰 방을 만들었으니 그 방은 원래 소제물과 유향과 그릇과 또 레위 사람들과 노래하는 자들과 문지기들에게 십일조로 주는 곡물과 새 포도주와 기름과 또 제사장들에게 주는 거제물을 두는 곳이라

sentences.original_text: and he had provided him with a large room
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 큰 방을 마련해 주었으며

sentences.original_text: formerly used to store the grain offerings
and also the tithes of grain
as well as the contributions for the priests
